quote: Surround yourself with people who lift you up and encourage you to be your best self.
author: Hailey Bieber

quote: The discipline of desire is the background of character.
author: John Locke

quote: If you never want to be criticized, for goodness' sake don't do anything new.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: Time is kind of an amazing thing because you can do so much with it.
author: Billie Eilish

quote: The limits of my language mean the limits of my world.
author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quote: The time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Dream big, but start small.
author: Billie Eilish

quote: Everything happens for a reason. You have to trust that what is meant to be will be.
author: Hailey Bieber

quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Only the paranoid survive.
author: Andy Grove

quote: Fashion is something that can really be a reflection of how you're feeling.
author: Hailey Bieber

quote: Growth and comfort do not coexist.
author: Ginni Rometty

quote: I lost myself again, but I remember you.
author: Billie Eilish

quote: If you're passionate about something, don't let anyone talk you out of it.
author: Hailey Bieber

quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
author: Socrates

quote: Most people overestimate what they can do in one year and underestimate what they can do in ten years.
author: Bill Gates

quote: I just want to keep growing, keep learning, and be a better version of myself every day.
author: Hailey Bieber

quote: Stay hungry, stay foolish.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
author: Alan Kay

quote: I don't know how to function without music. When I'm not making it, I'm listening to it.
author: Billie Eilish

quote: No man ever steps in the same river twice, for it's not the same river and he's not the same man.
author: Heraclitus

quote: I'm all about learning from my mistakes and using those lessons to move forward.
author: Hailey Bieber

quote: Music is a moral law. It gives soul to the universe, wings to the mind, flight to the imagination.
author: Plato

quote: What lies behind you and what lies in front of you, pales in comparison to what lies inside of you.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I just wish you could feel what you say.
author: Billie Eilish

quote: I've learned that being kind is the most important thing you can do.
author: Hailey Bieber

quote: I believe that beauty is more than skin deep. It's about who you are as a person.
author: Hailey Bieber

quote: You can never have too many shoes or too many friends.
author: Hailey Bieber

quote: Desperation sometimes drives innovation.
author: Dara Khosrowshahi

quote: Let come what comes, let go what goes. See what remains.
author: Ramana Maharshi

quote: The only way to deal with an unfree world is to become so absolutely free that your very existence is an act of rebellion.
author: Albert Camus

quote: I'm just trying to be a good person and treat people the way I would want to be treated.
author: Hailey Bieber

quote: History repeats itself, first as tragedy, second as farce.
author: Karl Marx

quote: I have had all the disadvantages required for success.
author: Larry Ellison

quote: What makes a song last is real content from a mind that is thinking a little bit harder about certain things.
author: Billie Eilish

quote: I don't belong to anyone, but everybody knows my name.
author: Billie Eilish

quote: Work takes on new meaning when you feel you are pointed in the right direction.
author: Tim Cook

quote: The best advice I ever received was to trust my instincts and not let fear control me.
author: Hailey Bieber

quote: If you're not embarrassed by the first version of your product, you've launched too late.
author: Reid Hoffman

quote: I'm inspired by women who are unapologetically themselves.
author: Hailey Bieber

quote: I've learned that you can't take life too seriously and you have to laugh at yourself.
author: Hailey Bieber

quote: People think you have to go through something to write about it, and you absolutely do not.
author: Billie Eilish

quote: It is the fight alone that pleases us, not the victory.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: You don't have to be a genius or a visionary or even a college graduate to be successful.
author: Michael Dell

quote: Experience without theory is blind, but theory without experience is mere intellectual play.
author: Immanuel Kant

quote: Everything has been figured out, except how to live.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: I'm all about confidence. It's something you build over time.
author: Hailey Bieber

quote: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
author: Alan Watts

quote: People are going to say what they're going to say, and you can't control that.
author: Hailey Bieber

quote: To live is to suffer, to survive is to find some meaning in the suffering.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I'm italic, I'm in bold.
author: Billie Eilish

quote: Make every detail perfect and limit the number of details to perfect.
author: Jack Dorsey

quote: Optimism is an essential ingredient for innovation.
author: Bob Noyce

quote: Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards.
author: SÃ¸ren Kierkegaard

quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
author: Aristotle

quote: Confidence is something you build over time, and it's not something that happens overnight.
author: Hailey Bieber

quote: In short, software is eating the world.
author: Marc Andreessen

quote: Talent hits a target no one else can hit; Genius hits a target no one else can see.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: We have two ears and one mouth so that we can listen twice as much as we speak.
author: Epictetus

quote: I love the idea of being independent and making my own choices.
author: Hailey Bieber

quote: It's so important to embrace your individuality. There's no one like you, and that's your power.
author: Hailey Bieber

quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
author: Confucius

quote: Take care of your mind, body, and soul. It's important to make sure you're healthy from the inside out.
author: Hailey Bieber

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

quote: Change before you have to.
author: Jack Welch

quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt
